options: ['A blouse.', 'Basketball clothes.', 'A T-shirt.', 'A pair of shoes.']
questions: What does Lin Feng really want?
article:
Lin Feng is a student of Class One, Grade Seven. He likes basketball very much. He often plays it after school. And he often goes home late. His home is not far from school. And his mother knows _ . So she doesn't worry about him.
One Saturday morning Lin Feng goes to a shop with his mother. The shop is very big. There are many things in it. It sells clothes, food and books. Then his mother says to him, "What do you want?" "I want a red blouse." says Lin Feng. "a red blouse?" asks his mother. "You can't wear a red blouse."
Lin Feng smiled, "OK, please get me basketball clothes."
